name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2010
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2010年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The primary aluminum ingot produced through the aluminum ingot casting process using liquid primary aluminum as described in this dataset is primarily designed for applications that require high purity aluminum. Such applications may include construction materials, transportation components including automotive parts, aircraft parts, consumer electronics, foils, and packaging materials. The data set indicates usage in scenarios where aluminum's properties like low density, high conductivity, and resistance to corrosion are particularly valued.
本数据集描述的液态原铝铝锭铸造过程产出的原生铝锭主要用于需要高纯度铝的应用场景。这些应用场景可能包括建筑材料、运输部件（包括汽车零件、飞机零件）、消费电子、箔材和包装材料。数据集指出在特别重视铝的低密度、高导电性和抗腐蚀性的场景中的使用。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The primary aluminum ingot produced through the aluminum ingot casting process using liquid primary aluminum as described in this dataset is primarily designed for applications that require high purity aluminum. Such applications may include construction materials, transportation components including automotive parts, aircraft parts, consumer electronics, foils, and packaging materials. The data set indicates usage in scenarios where aluminum's properties like low density, high conductivity, and resistance to corrosion are particularly valued.
本数据集描述的液态原铝铝锭铸造过程产出的原生铝锭主要用于需要高纯度铝的应用场景。这些应用场景可能包括建筑材料、运输部件（包括汽车零件、飞机零件）、消费电子、箔材和包装材料。数据集指出在特别重视铝的低密度、高导电性和抗腐蚀性的场景中的使用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilising this LCA data set for evaluating the environmental impact of products involving primary aluminum ingots, users are advised to take into account the specific year of data publication, which is 2010, as technology and environmental standards may have evolved since then, potentially affecting the accuracy of the data for present-day assessments. Users should integrate this data with up-to-date information and adjust for technological improvements or changes in energy sourcing. It is also essential for users to consider the geographical relevance of the data, as the background data is primarily derived from the Chinese localisation LCA database. When considering recycling in the life cycle assessment, users need to follow specific methodological guidelines relevant to aluminum recycling processes.

当使用这份LCA数据集来评估包含原生铝锭的产品的环境影响时，用户应该注意数据发布的具体年份是2010年，因为自那时起技术和环境标准可能已经发展变化，这可能会影响数据在当今评估中的准确性。用户应该将这些数据与最新信息结合，并调整以适应技术改进或能源来源变化。用户还必须考虑数据的地理相关性，因为背景数据主要来源于中国本地化的LCA数据库。在考虑生命周期评估中的回收时，用户需要遵循与铝回收过程相关的具体方法指导。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
